name: Stickman BMX
summary:
Stickman BMX - The long awaited sequel to the smash hit game 'Stickman Skater' is finally here on iPad! Our hero Stickson returns in the latest installment to test his skills on a street BMX bike. Do you have what it takes to survive the wide variety of terrain including forests, cities, oil refineries and the ultimate test that is living hell!
Simple to pick-up-and-play with plenty of depth to keep the avid gamer entertained for hours.
